name: Elite Trials
description:
Elite Trials is the best new bike trial game loved by players around the world. It’s time for an extreme action!

Unlock awesome bikes, race in fun and challenging single or multiplayer levels! Avoid dangerous obstacles like breaking glass, spikes, bombs and wind zones to collect your treasures.

Become the greatest extreme racer ever!

FEATURES:
• Collect 15 free bikes
• Do insane tricks
• Learn challenging trial tracks
• Upgrade and customize your bike
• Compete with players from around the world
• Progress through multiple leagues to the top


Support:
Are you having any problems? Contact us on: games@gxgames.co
